section.title: Editing
section.para: The documentation is written in XML files. To format the documentation we are using DocBook. In order to edit the XML files, you can either use your favorite text editor to directly edit the files (you must be familiar with the DocBook XML tags), or you can use an XML editor, such as XML mind XML Editor Standard Edition, which is free for personal and corporate internal use.
